logs.step1_raw_spec:
```plaintext
FUNCTION Separate_Vowels_And_Consonants(input_string)
    DECLARE vowels AS STRING = "aeiouAEIOU"
    DECLARE vowel_chars AS LIST
    DECLARE consonant_chars AS LIST
    
    FOR EACH character IN input_string DO
        IF character IS IN vowels THEN
            ADD character TO vowel_chars
        ELSE
            ADD character TO consonant_chars
        END IF
    END FOR
    
    RETURN concatenate(vowel_chars) + concatenate(consonant_chars)
END FUNCTION
```

    RETURN concatenate(vowel_chars) + concatenate(consonant_chars)
